name: 100 Rooms
description:
100 Rooms is walking simulator with a twist.

You will have choices to make through your journey. Do you go Left or Right? Do you go forward or go back the way you came? No jump scares, no quests, just you and the rooms. Are you strong enough to find the end? With several different levels of difficulty to play at your courage and mental fortitude, you will be tested to your limits. You can walk aimlessly through the environment enjoying the space and the sounds or rush through to get out as fast as you can.
